reviewText: packed full of info for the do it yourself gun builder. highly recommend.
Outstanding video - very well done camera work to follow Hershel's work, and excellent explanations of what he was doing and why.

I have other Black Powder rifle build VHS tapes I bought the DVD to go with my collection.
I was not disappointed it is well made and goes into some of the history and rifle styles for the period be represented.

These documentory rifle buliding films, no matter what the format, are classics, and a must for anyone seriously interested in traditional muzzleloading rifles and shooting. I'm moderately competent with hand tools, but what Mr. House produces is facinating to me, in the completed state.
